level.heading: Share and membership certificates; issuance and contents.
level.text: No certificate for share or membership capital shall be issued until the par value thereof has been paid for in full. A full or condensed statement of the requirements of §§ 29-913, 29-914, 29-915, and 29-927 shall be printed upon each certificate issued by an association.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
